sections.heading: in bar or abatement; verification by accused required
sections.text: No plea in bar or abatement shall be received by the court unless it be in writing, signed by the accused, and sworn to before some competent officer.SourceG.S.1873, c. 58, ยง 450, p. 823;R.S.1913, ยง 9094;C.S.1922, ยง 10119;C.S.1929, ยง 29-1817;R.S.
